metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000018 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4., and 4.6 are vulnerable to a DOS attack in thereplication status by using a specially crafted table name

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
